name: kinesis
effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user distracts the foe by bending a spoon. It may lower the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.platinum: The user distracts the foe by bending a spoon. It may lower the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user distracts the foe by bending a spoon. It may lower the target’s accuracy.
